title: BlackBoss_
author: BlackBoss_
created_time: December 19, 2022, 03:18:15 AMLast edit: December 20, 2022, 04:13:51 AM by BlackBoss_
content: Truflation is a website that provides Independent, economic & financial data in real time on-chainWebsite: https://truflation.com/Dashboard: https://app.truflation.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/truflationMedium: https://truflation.medium.com/Substack: https://truflation.substack.com/The site is helpful with data from multiple sources, data providers, unbiased to get historical inflation rates and it is updated daily, real time. With this site, you can get inflation rates before FED releases their reports.They have valuable articles on their Medium and Substack too.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: I just reviewed the website you posted here, thanks for bringing it to our attention. I guess this is a new site, but it has all that many might need in just one page, which makes it powerful even though it looks simple. But it seems that your interface is a bit different from mine as I only see data without having the option to select the data of the country I want to display on the screen like you selected the USA in your own case. Well, I will continue to use it, perhaps I would get acquainted with it over time.This is majorly an inflation site, which is good, and another thing I like about the site is that it is not fiat-company based as Coindesk is included as one of the tagged companies.
